requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel N4100 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0) capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 105 MB available space
